introText1: This app is a tool to help healthcare professionals assess the diagnostic criteria for Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorder (FASD) according to international guidelines (
infoAgeText: In children under 3 years of age, the neurocognitive assessment refers to whether there is a delay in neurodevelopment according to their age. The behavioral evaluation must be adapted to the chronological age of each child.
infoDomainsText: Watch the following video for more information on the affected domains:
watch_weight_video: Round down to the previous whole number if the decimal is less than .5, and round up to the next whole number if the decimal is equal to or greater than .5. Watch the following video for more information on how to measure weight:
watch_height_video: Round down to the previous whole number if the decimal is less than .5, and round up to the next whole number if the decimal is equal to or greater than .5. Watch the following video for more information on how to measure height:
measure_head_circumference: Round down to the previous whole number if the decimal is less than .5, and round up to the next whole number if the decimal is equal to or greater than .5. Use a non-stretchable tape measure. Firmly wrap the tape measure around the widest possible circumference of the head. The widest part of the forehead above the eyebrows, above the ears, the most prominent part of the back of the head. Watch the following video for more information on how to measure head circumference:
watch_palpebral_video: Watch the following video for more information on how to measure palpebral distance:
major_malformations: Major malformations related to prenatal alcohol exposure?
visit_link_diagnosis: Visit the link for more information about the diagnosis:
data_loss_confirmation: If you return to the Home page, the data entered during the diagnosis will be deleted. Are you sure you want to return to the Home page?
error_details: No details found for the patient
higher: Please enter a value greater than 24 months
name: Name
sure: Are you sure you want to delete the patient?
